channel.title: Rics NoteBook
channel.description: Studying the Art of Science & the Science of Art

item.title: Moover: Turn Any Truck into a Buck—The Campus Moving App Gainesville Needs
item.description: Moover is the on-demand platform that lets anyone with a truck turn moving day chaos into cash. From dorm swaps to Craigslist pickups, it's the peer-powered logistics app Gainesville’s been waiting for.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: QuestLink: Turning Campus & Community Projects into Paid, Purposeful Student Quests
item.description: Introducing QuestLink—a local project platform where professors, businesses, and grad students post real-world quests. Students accept them, complete them, get paid, and build networks and skills that matter—no unpaid internships, just paid purpose.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Workr: Revolutionizing the Construction Workforce with an Uber-Like Platform
item.description: Workr is a groundbreaking app designed to decentralize the construction workforce, enabling subcontractors and individuals to connect on-the-fly. This blog post explores how this platform empowers workers and transforms the construction industry in our technologically driven world.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
